name: Sleepyhead (Abdullah Kırmızıyüz)
description:
Who is that guy walking around in the middle of the night on the buildings with his pajamas? That's our friendly neighbor sleepyhead. Sleepyhead is such a heavy sleeper, did I mention he is also a sleepwalker? Walking on the buildings can be dangerous when you are not aware of your surroundings. Don't let sleepyhead hurt himself by falling or any other way. You can place various items  in your inventory to help sleepyhead out.Have fun and sweet dreams.

Controls
Left click and hold to drag the item on screen.
A-D to rotate items while holding.
